tool.name: ChangeUserSettings

param.name: Scratch_path
param.displayname: Scratch path (folder which will contain scratch geodatabases etc.)
param.dialogReference: Change where the NB for SEEA scratch files are written to.

param.name: Developer_mode
param.dialogReference: Turn on developer mode if you plan to make code changes. If enabled, you will not need to refresh the toolboxes after code changes.

param.name: Reset_all_settings
param.displayname: Reset all settings to their default values
param.dialogReference: Reset all user settings in this tool to their default values.

tool.summary: The Change User Settings tool allows you to configure some aspects of the Nature Braid for SEEA toolbox. You can change where the NB scratch files are written to, and if you plan to make some coding changes you will want to turn on developer mode.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: The Change User Settings tool allows you to configure some aspects of the Nature Braid for SEEA toolbox. You can change where the NB scratch files are written to, and if you plan to make some coding changes you will want to turn on developer mode.
